app.errorMessage: There has been an error in the transaction:

addWallet.descriptionLong:
Every Phantasma wallet unlocks access to a rich ecosystem of next generation Smart NFTs, powerful dApps, lightning fast transactions and a seamless user experience.

The best part?
It's virtually free to use!
addWallet.description1: Import a wallet with its address or name (read only), or private key in WIF or HEX format. When using private key you must protect it using a password.
addWallet.description2: Or if you don't have a wallet, you can
addWallet.description4: Or if you don't like it, you can
addWallet.created: Wallet created with the following address and private key (WIF format)
addWallet.recover: You only need your WIF to recover your wallet. Make sure you always have a secure backup.
addWallet.secure: Insert a password to secure your wallet. You can always use WIF to recover it.

authorize.description: wants to connect to Phantasma Link. Each transaction will request your permission. Do you want to allow it?
authorize.label: Authorize for

home.sendAmount2: How many do you want to send?
home.burnAmount2: How many do you want to burn?
home.burnConfirmation1: Please confirm that you are going to burn
home.burnConfirmation2: IMPORTANT NOTE: this is definitive and irreversible.
home.insertWIF: Insert your WIF to sign transaction.
home.insertPassword: Insert your password to sign transaction.
home.registerDescription: Your address name can be used as your public address. Be aware that you need to keep 2 SOUL staked or you will lose your name.
home.registerHints: Note: the name has to be between 3 and 15 characters, lowercase and can not start with a number.
home.registerDescription2: Stake SOUL to register a name and get daily KCAL rewards. Minimum stake period is 24 hours.
home.registerMain: You can use your account with a name instead of a public address.
home.destinationDesc: Select where do you want to send
home.haveStake: How many do you want to stake?
home.haveUnstake: staked SOUL. How many do you want to unstake?
home.claimDesc2: KCAL. This claims KCAL in advance, so you won't be able to unstake during 24h.
home.kcalExplanation: KCAL is used for every transaction on the blockchain. You get 0.002 KCAL per SOUL staked daily. You can claim some now.
home.swapHowMany: How many do you want to swap?
home.noSwapsNEO: There are no swappable assets in the NEO side of you wallet.
home.noSwapsETH: There are no swappable assets in the Ethereum side of you wallet.
home.noSwapsBSC: There are no swappable assets in the BSC side of you wallet.
home.sendAssetsSwap: Send the assets you want to swap to
home.withYourKey: with your hex private key (ie from Metamask)
home.swapToNeo: Send to NEO side of your wallet
home.swapToETH: Send to Ethereum side of your wallet
home.swapToBSC: Send to BSC side of your wallet
home.swapToAnotherNEO: Or swap to another NEO wallet
home.swapToAnotherETH: Or swap to another Ethereum wallet
home.swapToAnotherBSC: Or swap to another BSC wallet
home.swapExplanation: To allow swaps you need to use your WIF or HEX private key once. This will generate the NEO and Ethereum and BSC addresses linked to your wallet.
home.availableToSwap: You have the following available assets to send to
home.insertSwapsWIF: Insert your WIF to generate swap public addresses.
home.insertSwapsPassword: Insert your password to generate swap public address.
home.needGasToSwap: A NEO/NEP5 swap costs {0} GAS in fees.
home.needEthToSwap:
An ETH swap costs approx. {0} ETH in fees.
An ERC20 swap costs approx. {1} ETH in fees.
home.needBnbToSwap:
A BSC swap costs approx. {0} BNB in fees.
A BEP20 swap costs approx. {1} BNB in fees.
home.sendBeingProcessed: Your asset transfer is being processed.
home.cosmicSwap: You do not have enough KCAL to perform this transaction. Use some SOUL to perform a cosmic swap?

nfts.confirmBurn: Confirm that you want to burn
nfts.confirmBurnSecond: This is irreversible, destroys these NFTs and claims the infused assets, if any.
nfts.select: Select where do you want to send
nfts.insertWIF: Insert your WIF to sign transaction.
nfts.insertPassword: Insert your password to sign transaction.

sign.description: Do you want to allow to sign tx for
sign.notValid: WIF is not valid for address

signData.description: Do you want to allow to sign tx for
signData.notValid: WIF is not valid for address

wallets.title: Remove account
wallets.subtitle: Removes account
wallets.keyExplanation: The private key is the only thing required to allow access to your funds. Keep it safe.
wallets.enterPasswordDecrypt: Enter your password to decrypt the private key
